dict.acceptation: 死亡；（某种）死法，死亡方式；病危；死神；

sent.orig: I can only see death and more death, till we are black and swollen with death.
sent.trans: 我所能看到的只是死亡，以及更多死亡，直到最后我们自己也因为死亡而全身肿胀发黑。

sent.orig: "Death stalks you at every turn. aaah! There it is, death! Oh, where were we? Death!"
sent.trans: 死亡始终笼罩着你。啊！就是它，死亡！噢，我们说到哪儿了？死吧！

sent.orig: Objective:To discuss the interventional factors of death in MG(myasthenia gravis)patients to decrease the death rate.
sent.trans: 目的探讨重症肌无力患者的可干预因素以减少死亡率。

sent.orig: If there is no temperature regulation, pets will be death at high altitude or heat death.
sent.trans: 如果没有温度调节，宠物在高空会被冻死或热死。

sent.orig: The death penalty policy almost every aspect of the death penalty.
sent.trans: 死刑的制定、实施乃至存废都与死刑政策密切相关。
